data.message: This new change to Facebook groups is terrible. Give me back my ability to comment on an album photo and have it show up on the group's wall!!! At least make it an option that groups can turn on or off. You just completely screwed BST groups that rely on albums for organization.

replies.message: We're sorry to hear that, Alicia, but we appreciate your feedback. We're constantly working to improve the Facebook experience for everyone. If there's something we can do to improve yours, please let us know at: http://on.fb.me/1QVYLJn. -Kate
Facebook is there anywhere we can read about recent changes made to facebook and why the change(s) were made?
